org.timepedia.chronoscope.client
Class Datasets<T extends Tuple2D>

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.Datasets<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Dataset<T>>, org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable
public final class Datasets<T extends Tuple2D>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Dataset<T>>, org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable

Container for Dataset objects that provides indexed access to the datasets as well as maintaining aggregate information.

This container registers itself as a DatasetListener to any added MutableDatasetND objects in order to guarantee that aggregate information is kept up-to-date whenever constituent elements are modified.

Author:
chad takahashi

Specified by:
iterator in interface java.lang.Iterable<Dataset<T extends Tuple2D>>

remove

public Dataset<T> remove(int index)
Removes the element at the specified index in this container. Shifts any subsequent elements to the left (subtracts one from their indices). Returns the element that was removed from the container.

Be aware that this container de-registers itself as an DatasetListener to the dataset being removed. In other words, mutations applied to a dataset that once belonged to this container will no longer signal this container, which in turn, will no longer forward the mutation event to its listeners.

removePrivate

public Dataset<T> removePrivate(int index)
Remove a dataset without firing listeners.

Returns the number of datasets in this container.
